page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content: Most of the people living in this area fall into four categories,and together there is an increasingly{diverse {mixture}of age and background.The major group are those linked to the main form of activity in the area ,which is farming.There is a wide age range with{grandparents}who were born locally ,farmed here and are now living close to their families who have since inherited or taken over the tenancy of the farm.The total number now employed in farming is far fewer than it used to be,with the amount of mechanisation now involved.A second significant group consists of{younger {families}who are resident in the area,often having been born here but now dependant on jobs in Taunton or Wellington or Chard for example to provide incomes.Thirdly,a more recent smaller group often of families with
